title: Former Pro One of Two Fatalities at Flanders Fondo, Two Former Champions out of Paris-Roubaix
content:
Crashes at the men's and women's Tour of Flanders ripple through to Paris-Roubaix as Longo Borghini, Degenkolb both sidelined with significant injuries.

Read the full article at Former Pro One of Two Fatalities at Flanders Fondo, Two Former Champions out of Paris-Roubaix on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
